articles.author: Jake Coyle
articles.title: Louisville native Ned Beatty, titanic character actor of 'Network,' dies at 83 - WDRB
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Ned Beatty, the Oscar-nominated character actor who in half a century of American movies, including “Deliverance,” “Network” and “Superman,” was a booming, indelible presence in even the smallest parts, has died.

articles.title: Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan says consumer spending is 20% higher this year than 2019 - CNBC
articles.description: Nearly all spending categories have recovered with the exception of travel, according to the Bank of America CEO.
articles.content:
